title: Luminaires
fullText:
The exposed conductive parts of luminaires shall be earthed.
Exceptions:
1.	Luminaires need not be earthed where earthing of equipment is not required in accordance with Clause 5.4.1.
2.	Where a protective earthing conductor is not required in accordance with Clause 5.4.3.
3.	Where installed outdoors on a non-conductive pole and the luminaire is not in an earthed situation.
4.	Where supplied at ELV in accordance with Clause 7.5.
